item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Performance Degradation

We are currently investigating reports of degraded performance.

item.title: Increased HTTP latency and 504 rate
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Increased HTTP latency and 504 rate

Summary: There was an issue with increased latency and 504 error rates, which could have had a significant impact on user experience.

Dec 12, 09:45 EST
Resolved - Increased HTTP latency and 504 rate

item.title: Sonatype Data Services Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
Nov 4, 15:00 EDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 4, 13:00 EDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 27, 15:56 EDT
Scheduled - On Saturday, November the 4th, between 13:00 and 15:00 EDT, we will be performing necessary maintenance on the Sonatype Data Services. Due to external factors, we cannot entirely rule out the possibility of a short service disruption. In the unlikely event of such a disruption, the Data Services would respond with HTTP 5xx errors for most requests over the course of a few minutes during the mentioned time window.

item.title: Nexus IQ Data Services Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
Feb 5, 03:00 EST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 5, 01:00 EST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 3, 14:15 EST
Scheduled - Nexus IQ Data Services will have maintenance Saturday February 5th, from 1 PM - 3 PM EST.
During this time application analysis that normally take over 15 minutes to complete may timeout.
